title: Hour 3 - Marcellus Wiley (04-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Marcellus Wiley (04-03-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys react to former NFL head coach Rex Ryan calling Dallas Cowboys WR Amari Cooper a "turd", speak with Marcellus Wiley of FS1's "Speak For Yourself" for his take on Ryan's comments, and how he balances analysis with hot takery!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
